text:
Hi Both <@UGY6JNTB4> <@U02227D27V3>, Thanks for your responses. The trouble i'm having is doing both of these at the same time (I can do them both individually):-

• The adjusting columns widths of the image and text columns
• Setting up this layout with default content in my template
When I set the layout up with default content, the columns no longer appear editable width because i've had to specify the widths in my code.
Hey <@U03A2BZ3REG>, It’s hard to tell what the issue is without seeing your code. Can you share your DND template markup? I’m also down for a quick call to see the issue live. Let me know.
